text: Henryk Rozmiarek (13 January 1949 â€“ 10 March 2021) was a Polish handball player. He competed in the 1972 Summer Olympics, in the 1976 Summer Olympics, and in the 1980 Summer Olympics. In 1972 he was a member of the Polish team which finished tenth. Four years later he won the bronze medal with the Polish team. ==References== ==Other websites== *Profile Category:1949 births Category:2021 deaths Category:Olympic bronze medalists for Poland
title: Henryk Rozmiarek
